source_objects.description: Discover new how-to projects and learn advice from other do-it-yourselfers to fix up your home.
source_objects.title: Home Improvement & Gardening

items.title: A beginners guide to painting your home like a pro
items.headline: Painting tips and techniques for the home owner
objectives_summary: Learn all the tricks and techniques professional painters use to paint homes. At the end of this course, You will learn how to; prepare an area before painting it, roll out and cut in with a brush properly, use the right tools and how to dry wall and sand with ease. All the techniques taught within this instructional are easy to learn, retain and maintain.

items.title: Decluttering: Quickly Organize & Declutter Your Home

visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose
visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills
visible_instructors.name: Tatiana

items.headline: Decluttering & organizing your bedroom & kitchen. Declutter & organize with daily steps to decluttering your home today
objectives_summary: Get rid of the clutter in the different rooms of your home
BONUS tips and hacks for your bedroom, creative space and kitchen
Declutter and remodel your laundry room space

items.title: Ultimate Beginner's Guide to Gardening in Cold Climates
items.headline: You Can Grow Vegetables and Flowers in a Short Season
objectives_summary: Master the basics of growing flowers, vegetables, and other plants in cold climates where winter temperatures fall below freezing
Establish your first garden using step-by-step instructions
Select plants that are going to be successful in your garden space

items.title: Woodworking: Hand-Held Router Techniques

visible_instructors.title: George Vondriska
visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Editor & Instructor of Woodworkers Guild of America
visible_instructors.name: George

items.headline: This detailed course will cover everything you need to make your hand-held router as effective as possible in your shop.
objectives_summary: This woodworking course shows the versatility of hand-held routers and covers the keys to successful and safe use.
Techniques to help achieve the best results when using your router.
Advanced skills to make your projects looks more professional and add decorative elements.

items.title: Irrigation 101: Drip Irrigation For Lawn And Farm
items.headline: Learn everything you need to know about using low-volume drip irrigation for your landscape or garden.
objectives_summary: Choose the right drip irrigation product
Properly plan a project that uses drip irrigation
Install and enjoy a low volume irrigation system!

items.title: Easily Grow Flowers, Herbs, & More With Container Gardening
items.headline: Grow beautiful flowers, fresh herbs, and tasty vegetables the easy way (even in small spaces) with container gardening!
objectives_summary: Know what containers to use for a container garden
How to plant a container garden
How to maintain a container garden

items.title: Security alarm systems - The complete course from A-Z
items.headline: Learn to install a professional security system for your home or business that will report to your phone without fees
objectives_summary: How to design and install a professional security system for your home or business, from an experienced security system technician
Proper programming of the system to meet your needs and specifications
The ability to control your security system remotely from your phone, tablet, or computer.

items.title: How to make lamp shades

visible_instructors.title: Ruth McAllister
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder & professional lampshade maker at Quincy Lampshades
visible_instructors.name: Ruth

items.headline: Create bespoke decor for your home by learning how to make professionally finished drum lampshades
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will be able to make rolled-edge fabric covered drum lampshades
Learn techniques from a professional lampshade maker
Learn which fabrics to avoid when making lampshades

items.title: Machine learning and artificial intelligence in hydroponics
items.headline: Get real time data from hydroponics to predict plant growth with a new era of machine learning
objectives_summary: You will learn how to set an own hydroponic farm
Different types in hydroponics
Basics of hydroponics and learn how to grow using hydroponics techniques

items.title: All About Gardening With Herbs
items.headline: Your Guide to Growing, Harvesting, Cooking With, & Preserving a Bounty of Herbs
objectives_summary: You'll learn exactly which herbs are right for your unique garden situation.
How to successfully grow them and the best varieties to grow, including some super unique ones.
When and how to harvest your herbs during the growing season.

items.title: Vastu Intermediate Course (Science Behind Vastu- NEHA PARIK)

visible_instructors.name: Neha
visible_instructors.title: Neha Parik
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of Science Behind Vastu & MAHAVASTU Expert

items.headline: This course enables you to understand Vastushastra in deeper way & exploring career in VASTU
objectives_summary: Methods to find the Center of irregular Plots
Topology
Disha Shool ( Favorable directions according to days )

items.title: Growing Great Compost
items.headline: Everything you need to know about the art of making compost
objectives_summary: How to make high quality compost

items.title: Gardening Know How: Sustainable Pest Control
items.headline: A 6 step method that will help you deal with insect pests in your yard or garden
objectives_summary: Solve insect pest issues in your yard or garden using earth friendly control methods
Create a customized action plan that will help you effectively deal with insect pests
Identify insects that are present in your  yard or garden

items.title: Soil, The Key To Organic Gardening
items.headline: Gardenning Chemically Free
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn how organic gardening starts with the soil. I consider soil science to be the foundation to gardening. The goal of this course is to educate individuals who want to learn to garden and to show how it can be done chemically free by restoring the soil.
Good soil helps you to be free and independent from fertilizers, while creating a more ecologically-balanced Earth and producing better, bigger vegetables.

items.title: Feng Shui Tips To Attract Success

visible_instructors.name: Ann Bingley
visible_instructors.title: Ann Bingley Gallops
visible_instructors.job_title: Feng Shui Expert & Teacher at Open Spaces Feng Shui

items.headline: When we understand how to receive support, we may attract the right people and circumstances to create abundant success!
objectives_summary: By the end of this class you will have an all encompassing understanding of the Travel & Helpful People sector of your space.

You will have an understanding of design details in your space that may be depleteing you of the good energy in your home, as well as Feng Shui adjustments to enhance positive energy and transform negative energy.

Now that you have an accurate understanding of the influences and energies in this sector, you may start practicing the cures to create more support from the creative powers of the "heavens" and from those around you.

items.title: The Odd Gumnut's Guide to Radical Self-Reliance
items.headline: All the knowledge you need to ditch the system and start livin' a healthy, zero-waste, chemical free life!
objectives_summary: Permaculture
Growing food
Organic farming
